text:
Equating Holocaust yellow stars 2 #vaccine passports?

This may be the most off-base, repugnant, hateful, insensitive, irrational, idiotic, disgusting, ignorant tweet in Twitter history. And that's no small feat.

#COVID19 #COVID #Libertarians #MAGA #GOP #coronavirus #vaccination https://t.co/RKLLNInyf7
